You can paste magnet links anywhere in P: You can paste magnet links anywhere in Popcorn Time with CTRL+V.
You can drag & drop a .torrent file into: You can drag & drop a .torrent file into Popcorn Time.
The Popcorn Time project started in Febr: The Popcorn Time project started in February 2014 and has already had 150 people that contributed more than 3000 times to it's development in August 2014.
If a subtitle for a TV series is missing: If a subtitle for a TV series is missing, you can add it on opensubtitles.org. And the same way for a movie, but on yifysubtitles.com.
If you're experiencing connection drop i: If you're experiencing connection drop issues, try to reduce the DHT Limit in settings.
If you search \"1998\", you can see all: If you search "1998", you can see all the movies or TV series that came out that year.
You can login to Trakt.tv to save all yo: You can login to Trakt.tv to save all your watched items, and synchronize them across multiple devices.
Clicking on the rating stars will displa: Clicking on the rating stars will display a number instead.
This application is entirely written in: This application is entirely written in HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript.
You can find out more about a movie or a: You can find out more about a movie or a TV series? Just click the IMDb icon.
Clicking twice on a \"Sort By\" filter r: Clicking twice on a "Sort By" filter reverses the order of the list.
With Popcorn Time, you can watch Movies: With Popcorn Time, you can watch Movies and TV Series really easily. All you have to do is click on one of the covers, then click 'Watch Now'. But your experience is highly customizable:
Our Movies collection only contains High: Our Movies collection only contains High-Definition movies, available in 720p and 1080p. To watch a movie, simply open Popcorn Time and navigate through the movies collection, reachable through the 'Movies' tab, in the navigation bar. The default view will show you all movies sorted by popularity, but you can apply your own filters, thanks to the 'Genre' and 'Sort by' filters. Once you have chosen a movie you want to watch, click its cover. Then click 'Watch Now'. Don't forget the popcorn!
The TV Series tab, that you can reach by: The TV Series tab, that you can reach by clicking 'TV Series' in the navigation bar, will show you all available series in our collection. You can also apply your own filters, same as the Movies, to help you decide what to watch. In this collection, also just click the cover: the new window that will appear will allow you to navigate through Seasons and Episodes. Once your mind is set, just click the 'Watch Now' button.
A slider next to the 'Watch Now' button: A slider next to the 'Watch Now' button will let you choose the quality of the stream. You can also set a fixed quality in the Settings tab. Warning: a better quality equals more data to download.
Most of our Movies and TV Series have su: Most of our Movies and TV Series have subtitles in your language. You can set them in the Settings tab. For the Movies, you can even set them through the dropdown menu, in the Movie Details page.
Clicking the heart icon on a cover will: Clicking the heart icon on a cover will add the movie/show to your favorites. This collection is reachable through the heart-shaped icon, in the navigation bar. To remove an item from your collection, just click on the icon again! How simple is that?
Popcorn Time will keep in mind what you': Popcorn Time will keep in mind what you've already watched - a little help remembering doesn't cause any harm. You can also set an item as watched by clicking the eye-shaped icon on the covers. You can even build and synchronize your collection with Trakt.tv website, via the Settings tab.
In Popcorn Time, you can use the magnifi: In Popcorn Time, you can use the magnifier icon to open the search. Type a Title, an Actor, a Director or even a Year, press 'Enter' and let us show you what we can offer to fill your needs. To close your current search, you can click on the 'X' located next to your entry or type something else in the field.
If you prefer to use a custom player ins: If you prefer to use a custom player instead of the built in one, you can do so by clicking the allocated icon on the 'Watch Now' button. A list of your installed players will be shown, select one and Popcorn Time will send everything to it. If your player isn't on the list, please report it to us.
To push the customization even further,: To push the customization even further, we offer you a large panel of options. To access the Settings, click the wheel-shaped icon in the navigation bar.
The entire list of keyboard shortcuts is: The entire list of keyboard shortcuts is available by pressing '?' on your keyboard, or through the keyboard-shaped icon in the Settings tab.
You can use custom torrents and magnets: You can use custom torrents and magnets links in Popcorn Time. Simply drag and drop .torrent files into the application's window, and/or paste any magnet link.
On the details of Movies/TV Series, you: On the details of Movies/TV Series, you can find a little circle, colored in grey, red, yellow or green. Those colors refer to the health of the torrent. A green torrent will be downloaded quickly, while a red torrent may not be downloaded at all, or very slowly. The color grey represents an error in the health calculation for Movies, and needs to be clicked in TV Series in order to display the health.
Popcorn Time streams video content throu: Popcorn Time streams video content through torrents. Our movies are provided by %s and our TV Series by %s, while getting all metadata from %s. We don't host any content ourselves.
Torrent streaming? Well, torrents use Bi: Torrent streaming? Well, torrents use Bittorrent protocol, which basically means that you download small parts of the content from another user's computer, while sending the parts you already downloaded to another user. Then, you watch those parts, while the next ones are being downloaded in the background. This exchange allows the content to stay healthy.
Once the movie is fully downloaded, you: Once the movie is fully downloaded, you continue to send parts to the other users. And everything is deleted from your computer when you close Popcorn Time. As simple as that.
The application itself is built with Nod: The application itself is built with Node-Webkit, HTML, CSS and Javascript. It works like the Google Chrome browser, except that you host the biggest part of the code on your computer. Yes, Popcorn Time works on the same technology as a regular website, like... let's say Wikipedia, or Youtube!
I found a bug, how do I report it?: I found a bug, how do I report it?
Warning: Always use English when contact: Warning: Always use English when contacting us, or we might not understand you.
You can find it later on the About page: You can find it later on the About page
You can create an account on our %s repo: You can create an account on our %s repository, and click on %s.
Use the %s issue filter to search and ch: Use the %s issue filter to search and check if the issue has already been reported or is already fixed.
Include a screenshot if relevant - Is yo: Include a screenshot if relevant - Is your issue about a design feature or a bug?
A good bug report shouldn't leave others: A good bug report shouldn't leave others needing to chase you up for more information. Be sure to include the details of your environment.
Popcorn Time! is the result of many deve: Popcorn Time! is the result of many developers and designers putting a bunch of APIs together to make the experience of watching torrent movies as simple as possible.
We are an open source project. We are fr: We are an open source project. We are from all over the world. We love our movies. And boy, do we love popcorn.
Log in into your GitLab account: Log in into your GitLab account
You will not be able to edit or delete y: You will not be able to edit or delete your report once sent.
If any additionnal information is requir: If any additionnal information is required, the report might be closed, as you won't be able to provide them.
Step 1: Please look if the issue was alr: Step 1: Please look if the issue was already reported
I want to report a new issue: I want to report a new issue
Note: please don't use this form to cont: Note: please don't use this form to contact us. It is limited to bug reports only.
A short description of the issue. If sui: A short description of the issue. If suitable, include the steps required to reproduce the bug.
This feature only works if you have your: This feature only works if you have your TraktTv account synced. Please go to Settings and enter your credentials.
The remote movies API failed to respond,: The remote movies API failed to respond, please check %s and try again later
